name: Mattress
description: Hi, an elderly man who has only left a month to live has requested for an extra mattress as his current mattress is too thin and hurting his bones. Client is very skinny now. Appreciate a single size mattress urgently. Thank you!

name: Phone
description: Client is a single mother who had been unemployed for a period due to parenting needs. The family does not have additional expenses for additional items. Client hopes to be able to reduce her phone expenses by having a house phone instead of only relying on her hp. Owning a home phone would allow client to reduce her phone bills.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

passiton.name: Phone cases
passiton.description:
I have shut down my online business, hence these are the left inventory stocks which would like to bless to someone who keen to take all the stocks.
Including Iphone 11,12, 13 casing,iphone watch strap, Iphone cables,phone rings, etc. Pls arrange your own transport to carry all the stocks.
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Phone
description: Client, husband and her 4 children (F20, M17, M10 and M5) are living in a rental flat. Client is full time caregiver to her youngest son who has autism and ADHD. Her husband is working as a grabfood rider and family is not on any financial assistance as husband's income is sufficient for family's basic needs. M5 recently threw client's phone, resulting in parts of the screen going blank and unresponsive. As finances are tight and only sufficient for basic needs, she is unable to afford another phone and would appreciate any brand of Android phone.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
contact.name: Chan Yvonne

name: Baby Cot
description: Client is currently pregnant with triplets and is due to give birth in July. She has 4 other young children and together with her husband, the family of 6 is sustaining on husband’s income as a delivery rider. With the upcoming birth of the triplets, there are foreseeable increasing financial challenges for the family in meeting their needs adequately. The family is looking for a baby cot for the triplets and will benefit from donations to alleviate the financial costs. Interested donors kindly contact social worker Theresa at 6365 8751

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Lei Hui Yun

passiton.name: Baby Cot/Playpen
passiton.description: Excellent Condition, can be folded

passiton.name: Baby Spring Cot
passiton.description: Used item by previous tenant. Have to assemble from parts with light screwing. Sarong cloth will need washed and dried before donating. Self collection preferred (negotiable).

name: baby cot

name: Refrigerator
description: A family of 3 (F/37, M/66 and their six-month-old infant) are relocating from a shelter to a rental unit, thus they do not have most of the essential appliances due to financial constraints. The family requires a refrigerator because they frequently cook at home to save money and provide solid food for the infant. The family does not mind a used refrigerator as long as it is in good functioning order.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Kelly Lim

passiton.name: Refrigerator
passiton.description: In good working condition. I will cover half the cost of delivery which is $30. Must be picked up by Saturday 25 May.

It is not sustainable for them to buy food everyday, and the refrigerator would greatly help them to store food ingredients which can be used for cooking.

name: Refrigerator

His refrigerator has dead cockroaches inside he has been low mood and wound appreciate if there is new refrigerator that he could look forward.

passiton.name: Refrigerator

name: Fridge
description: Client (F/33) is a single parent to her 4 primary school going children. Due to her caregiving responsibilities, it is a challenge to seek employment as her children continue to need Client's supervision and support. Client's current fridge is minimally functioning and soon to be spoiled. As client and her family are currently meeting their basic needs with the aid of financial assistance, any added essential but big ticket item is beyond their means. Hence we are seeking a fridge to support their daily functioning and basic food needs.

passiton.name: Samsung fridge
passiton.description: In working conditions

name: Fridge
description:
Client is the main caregiver and breadwinner to her 3 children. She is also a caregiver to her elderly father who has various medical issues. She has a strained relationship with her husband who does not provide financially to the household expenses. Due to her limited income, it is challenging for her to afford a new fridge, after their current one spoiled recently. 
Please contact Hwee Shan at khoohweeshan@allkin.org.sg/ 64546678 to liaise regarding the delivery. Thank you.
